name: YouBestow
tag_list: business-to-consumer-social-networking, b2c-social-networking, research, refer, rewards, recommendation-from-trusted-acquaintances, refer-a-friend, referral-partner, recommendation
overview:
YouBestow.com, a powerful Business to Consumer (B2C) social networking tool, empowers individual consumers to generate revenue for their favorite businesses.

YouBestow partners with the businesses to create and manage an effective referral program. The website brings businesses together and provides a social networking platform to their consumers where they generate revenue.

YouBestow provides a unique platform for its users, where they participate in product/service research, recommend products/services to their trusted acquaintances, and earn rewards from those recommendations.
